GE07bhg4c01u:3: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvata saṃjaya //1//
GE07bhg4c01u:12: seyaṃ subodhinī ṭīkā sadā dhyeyā manīṣibhiḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:13: iha khalu sakala-loka-hitāvatāraḥ parama-kāruṇiko bhagavān devakī-nandanas tattvājñāna-vijṛmbhita-śoka-moha-bhraṃśita-vivekatayā
GE07bhg4c01u:16: tam eva bhagavad-upadiṣṭam arthaṃ kṛṣṇa-dvaipāyanaḥ saptabhiḥ śloka-śatair upanibabandha /
GE07bhg4c01u:17: tatra ca prāyaśaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-mukhād viniḥsṛtān eva ślokān alikhat /
GE07bhg4c01u:20: gītā sugītā kartavyā kim anyaiḥ śāstra-vistaraiḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:21: yā svayaṃ padmanābhasya mukha-padmād viniḥsṛtā // iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:23: viṣīdann idam abravīd ity antena granthena śrī-kṛṣṇārjuna-saṃvāda-prastāvāya kathā nirūpyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:24: tataḥ param āsamāptes tayor dharma-jñānārthe saṃvādaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:25: tatra dharma-kṣetra ity ādinā ślokena dhṛtarāṣṭrena hastināpura-sthitaṃ sva-sārathiṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:26: samīpasthaṃ sañjayaṃ prati kurukṣetra-vṛttānte pṛṣṭhe sañjayo hastināpurasthito 'pi
GE07bhg4c01u:27: vyāsa-prasāda-labdha-divya-cakṣuḥ kurukṣetra-vṛttāntaṃ sākṣāt paśyann iva dhṛtarāṣṭrāya nivedayāmāsa /
GE07bhg4c01u:35: tasya kuror dharma-sthāne māmakā mat-putrāḥ pāṇḍu-putrāś ca yuyutsavo yoddhum icchantaḥ samavetāḥ militāḥ santaḥ kim akurvata kiṃ kṛtavantaḥ
GE07bhg4c01u:43: yateḥ prabhor eva mate tad atra
GE07bhg4c01u:47: bhavābdhi-nimajjamānān jagaj-janān udhṛtya sva-saundarya-mādhuryāsvādanayā svīya-prema-mahāmbudhau nimajjayāmāsa /
GE07bhg4c01u:49: duṣṭānām api sva-dveṣṭṝṇām api mahā-saṃsāra-grāsībhūtānām api mukti-dāna-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:51: api jīvān uddhartuṃ śāstra-kṛn-muni-gaṇa-gīyamāna-yaśaś ca dhartuṃ sva-priya-sakhaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:52: tādṛśa-svecchā-vaśād eva raṇa-mūrdhany udbhūta-śoka-mohaṃ śrīmad-arjunaṃ lakṣyīkṛtya
GE07bhg4c01u:54: aṣṭādaśādhyāyam antarbhūtāṣṭādaśa-vidyaṃ sākṣād vidyamānīkṛtam iva parama-puruṣārtham
GE07bhg4c01u:59: tatrāpi bhakti-yogasyātirahasyatvād ubhaya-saṅjīvakatvenābhyarhitatvāt sarva-durlabhatvāc ca madhyavartīkṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:60: karma-jñānayor bhakti-rāhityena vaiyarthyāt te dve bhakti-miśre eva sammatīkṛte /
GE07bhg4c01u:61: bhaktis tu dvividhā kevalā pradhānībhūtā ca /
GE07bhg4c01u:63: te dve karma-jñāne vinaiva viśuddha-prabhāvatī akiñcanā ananyādi-śabda-vācyā /
GE07bhg4c01u:64: dvitīyā tu karma-jñāna-miśrety akhilam agre vivṛtībhaviṣyati /
GE07bhg4c01u:65: athārjunasya śoka-mohau kathambhūtāv ity apekṣāyāṃ mahābhārata-vaktā śrī-vaiśampāyano janamejayaṃ prati tatra bhīṣma-parvaṇi kathām avatārayati dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:66: kurukṣetre yuyutsavo yuddhārthaṃ saṅgatā māmakā duryodhanādyāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥ kiṃ kṛtavantas tad brūhi /
GE07bhg4c01u:67: nanu yuyutsava iti tvaṃ bravīṣy evāto yuddham eva kartum udyatās te tad api kim akurvateti kenābhiprāyeṇa pṛcchasīty ata āha dharmakṣetra iti
GE07bhg4c01u:68: kurukṣetraṃ deva-yajanam iti śrutes tat-kṣetrasya dharma-pravartakatvaṃ prasiddham /
GE07bhg4c01u:69: atas tat-saṃsarga-mahimnā yady adharmikāṇām api duryodhanādīnāṃ krodha-nivṛttyā dharme matiḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c01u:70: pāṇḍavās tu svabhāvata eva dhārmikās tato bandhu-hiṃsanam anucitam ity ubhayeṣām api viveke udbhūte sandhir api sambhāvyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:71: tataś ca mamānanda eveti sañjayaṃ prati jñāpayitum iṣṭo bhāvo bāhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:72: ābhyantaras tu sandhau sati pūrvavat sakaṇṭakam eva rājyaṃ mad-ātmajānām iti me durvāra eva viṣādaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:73: tasmād asmākīno bhīṣmas tv arjunena durjaya evety ato yuddham eva śreyas tad eva bhūyād iti tu tan-manorathopayogī durlakṣyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:74: atra dharma-kṣetre iti kṣetra-padena dharmasya dharmāvatārasya saparikara-yudhiṣṭhirasya dhānyasthānīyatvam /
GE07bhg4c01u:85: tattvaṃ paraṃ sphurati durgamam apy ajasraṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:87: atha sukha-cid-ghanaḥ svayaṃ bhagavān acintya-śaktiḥ puruṣottamaḥ sva-saṅkalpāyatta-vicitra-jagad-udayādi-viriñcy-ādi-sañcintya-caraṇaḥ
GE07bhg4c01u:88: sva-janmādi-līlayā sva-tulyān sahāvirbhūtān pārṣadān praharṣayaṃs tayaiva jīvān bahūn
GE07bhg4c01u:90: svātma-bhūtam apy arjunam avitarkya-sva-śaktyā samoham iva kurvan tan-moha-vimārjanāpadeśena
GE07bhg4c01u:101: karma tu prāg-abhāvavad anādi vināśi ca /
GE07bhg4c01u:102: tatra saṃvit-svarūpo 'pīśvaro jīvaś ca saṃvettāsmad-arthaś ca - vijñānam ānandaṃ brahma,
GE07bhg4c01u:107: sukham aham asvāpsaṃ na kiñcid avediṣam ity ādi śruteś ca /
GE07bhg4c01u:110: sa ca sa ca kartā bhoktā siddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva-vit kartā boddhā iti padebhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:112: so 'śnute sarvān kāmān saha brahmaṇā vipaścitā iti śrutes tūbhayos tat pravyaktam /
GE07bhg4c01u:113: yadyapi saṃvit-svarūpāt saṃvettṛtvādi nānyat prakāśa-svarūpād raver iva prakāśakatvādi,
GE07bhg4c01u:116: sa ca bhedābhāve 'pi bheda-kāryasya dharma-dharmi-bhāvādi-vyavahārasya hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:117: sattā satī bhedo bhinnaḥ kālaḥ sarvadāstīty ādiṣu vidvadbhiḥ pratītaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:118: tat-pratīty-anyathānupapattyā - evaṃ dharmān pṛthak paśyaṃs tān evānuvidhāvati iti śrutyā ca siddhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:119: iha hi brahma-dharmān abhidhāya tad-bhedaḥ pratiṣidhyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:120: na khalu bheda-pratinidhes tasyāpy abhāve dharma-dharmi-bhāva-dharma-bahutve śakye vaktum ity anicchubhir api svīkāryāḥ syuḥ ta ime 'rthāḥ śāstre 'smin yathāsthānam anusandheyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:121: iha hi jīvātma-paramātma-tad-dhāma tat-prāpty-upāyānāṃ svarūpāṇi yathāvan nirūpyante /
GE07bhg4c01u:122: tatra jīvātma-yāthātmya-paramātma-yāthātmyopayogitayā paramātma-yāthātmyaṃ tu tad-upāsanopayogitayā prakṛtyādikaṃ tu paramātmanaḥ sraṣṭur upakaraṇatayopadiśyate
GE07bhg4c01u:125: sva-vihitasya karmaṇaḥ hṛd-viśuddhi-dvārā jñāna-bhaktyor upakāritvāt paramparayā
GE07bhg4c01u:127: tac ca śruti-vihita-karma hiṃsā-śūnyam atra mukhyam /
GE07bhg4c01u:128: mokṣa-dharme pitā-putrādi-saṃvādāt hiṃsāvat tu gauṇaṃ viprakṛṣṭatvāt tayos tu sākṣād eva tathātvam /
GE07bhg4c01u:129: nanu, tathānuṣṭhitena karmaṇā hṛd-viśuddhyā jñānodayena muktau satyāṃ bhaktyā ko viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:130: ucyate, jñānam eva kiñcid viśeṣād bhaktir iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:131: nirṇimeṣa-vīkṣaṇa-kaṭākṣa-vīkṣaṇa-vadanayor antaraṃ cid-vigrahatayānusandhir jñānaṃ tena tat sālokyādiḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:133: bhakter jñānatvaṃ tu “sac-cid-ānandaika-rase bhakti-yoge tiṣṭhati” iti śruteḥ siddham /
GE07bhg4c01u:135: jñānasya śravaṇādyākāratvaṃ cit-sukhasya viṣṇoḥ kuntalādi-pratīkatvavat pratyetavyam iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:139: antyena tu pūrvoditānām eveśvarādīnāṃ svarūpāṇi pariśodhyante /
GE07bhg4c01u:144: teṣu svargādi-lokān api didṛkṣr niṣṭhayā sva-dharmān hary-arcana-rūpān ācaran prathamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:151: aśeṣa-kleśa-nivṛtti-pūrvakas tat-sākṣāt-kāras tu prayojanam ity anubandha-catuṣṭayam /
GE07bhg4c01u:152: atreśvarādiṣu triṣu brahma-śabdo 'kṣara-śabdaś ca baddha-jīveṣu tad-deheṣu ca kṣara-śabdaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:153: īśvara-jīva-dehe manasi buddhau dhṛtau yatne cātma-śabdaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:154: triguṇāyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ śīle svarūpe ca prakṛti-śabdaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:156: karmādiṣu triṣu citta-vṛtti-nirodhe ca yoga-śabdaḥ paṭhyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:157: etac chāstraṃ khalu svayaṃ bhagavataḥ sākṣād vacanaṃ sarvataḥ śreṣṭhaṃ --
GE07bhg4c01u:158: gītā sugītā kartavyā kim anyaiḥ śāstra-vistaraiḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:159: yā svayaṃ padmanābhasya mukha-padmād viniḥsṛtā // iti pādmāt /
GE07bhg4c01u:161: tac ca lavaṇākara-nipāta-nyāyena tan-mayam ity upodghātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:166: iti tāvad bhagavad-arjuna-saṃvādaṃ prastautuṃ kathā nirūpyate/
GE07bhg4c01u:168: tad-bhagavataḥ pārtha-sārathyaṃ vidvān dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sva-putra-vijaye sandihānaḥ sañjayaṃ pṛcchatīty āha /
GE07bhg4c01u:170: yuyutsavo yoddhum icchavo māmakā mat-putrāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca kurukṣetre samavetāḥ kim akurvateti /
GE07bhg4c01u:171: nanu yuyutsavaḥ samavetā iti tvam evātthya tato yudherann eva punaḥ kim akurvateti kas te bhāva iti cet,
GE07bhg4c01u:173: “yad anu kurukṣetraṃ devānāṃ deva-yajanaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ brahma-sadanam ity ādi-śravaṇād dharma-prarohi-bhūmi-bhūtaṃ kurukṣetraṃ prasiddham
GE07bhg4c01u:174: tat-prabhāvād vinaṣṭa-vidveṣā mat-putrāḥ kiṃ pāṇḍavebhyas tad-rājyaṃ dātuṃ niścikyuḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:175: kiṃ vā, pāṇḍavāḥ sadaiva dharma-śīlā dharma-kṣetre tasmin kula-kṣaya-hetukād adharmād bhītā vana-praveśam eva śreyo vimamṛśur iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:176: he sañjayeti vyāsa-prasādād vinaṣṭa-rāga-dveṣas tvaṃ tathyaṃ vadety-arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:177: pāṇḍavānāṃ māmakatvānuktir dhṛtarāṣṭrasya teṣu droham abhivyanakti /
GE07bhg4c01u:178: dhānya-kṣetrāt tad-virodhināṃ dhānyābhāsānām iva dharma-kṣetrāt tad-virodhināṃ dharmābhāsānāṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:179: tvat-putrāṇām apagamo bhāvīti dharma-kṣetra-śabdena gīr-devyā vyajyate //1//
GE07bhg4c01u:182: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavānīkaṃ vyūḍhaṃ duryodhanas tadā /
GE07bhg4c01u:185: pāṇḍavānām anīkaṃ sainyaṃ vyūḍhaṃ vyūha-racanayā adhiṣṭhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā droṇācārya-samīpaṃ gatvā rājā duryodhano vakṣyamāṇaṃ vacanam uvāca //2//
GE07bhg4c01u:186: Viśvanāthaḥ - vidita-tad-abhiprāyas tad-āśāṃsitaṃ yuddham eva bhavet /
GE07bhg4c01u:187: kintu tan-manoratha-pratikulam iti manasi kṛtvā uvāca dṛṣṭveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:191: Baladevaḥ - evaṃ janmāndhasya prajñā-cakṣuṣo dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dharma-prajñā-vilopān
GE07bhg4c01u:192: mohāndhasya mat-putraḥ kadācit pāṇḍavebhyas tad-rājyaṃ dadyād iti vimlāna-cittasya
GE07bhg4c01u:193: bhāvaṃ vijñāya dharmiṣṭhaḥ sañjayas tvat-putraḥ kadācid api tebhyo rājyaṃ nārpayuṣyatīti
GE07bhg4c01u:196: ācāryaṃ dhanur-vidyā-pradaṃ droṇam upasaṅgamya svayam eva tad-antikaṃ gatvā rājā rāja-nīti-nipuṇaḥ vacanam alpākṣaratvaṃ gambhīrārthatvaṃ saṅkrānta-vacana-viśeṣam
GE07bhg4c01u:197: atra svayam ācārya-sannidhigamanena pāṇḍava-sainya-prabhāva-darśana-hetukaṃ tasyāntar-bhayaṃ guru-gauraveṇa tad-antikaṃ svayam āgatavān asmīti bhaya-saṅgopanaṃ ca vyajyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:198: tad idaṃ rāja-nīti-naipuṇyād iti ca rāja-padena //2//
GE07bhg4c01u:202: Śrīdhara: tad eva vacanam āha paśyaitām ity ādibhiḥ navabhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:204: pāṇḍavānāṃ mahatīṃ vitatāṃ camūṃ senāṃ paśya /
GE07bhg4c01u:205: tava śiṣyeṇa drupada-putreṇa dhṛṣṭadyumnena vyūḍhāṃ vyūha-racanayādhiṣṭhitām //3//
GE07bhg4c01u:206: Viśvanātha: drupada-putreṇa dhṛṣṭadyumnena tava śiṣyeṇa sva-vadhārtham utpanna iti jānatāpi tvayāyam adhyāpita iti tava manda-buddhitvam /
GE07bhg4c01u:207: dhīmateti śatror api tvattaḥ sakāśāt tvad-vadhopāya-vidyā gṛhītety asya mahābuddhitvaṃ phal-kāle 'pi paśyeti bhāvaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c01u:208: Baladeva: tat tādṛśaṃ vacanam āha paśyaitām ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c01u:209: priya-śiṣyeṣu yudhiṣṭhirādiṣu snehātiśayād ācāryo na yudhyed iti vibhāvya tat-kopotpādanāya tasmiṃs tad-avajñāṃ vyañjayann āha etām iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:210: etām atisannihitāṃ prāgalbhyenācāryam atiśūraṃ ca tvām avigaṇayya sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā tad-avajñāṃ pratīhīti,
GE07bhg4c01u:212: drupada-putreṇeti tvad-vairiṇā drupadena tvad-vadhāya dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ putro yajñāgni-kuṇḍād utpādito 'stīti /
GE07bhg4c01u:213: tava śiṣyeṇeti tvaṃ sva-śatruṃ jānann api dhanur-vidyām adhyāpitavān asīti tava manda-dhītvam /
GE07bhg4c01u:214: dhīmateti śatros tvattas tvad-vadhopāyo gṛhīta iti tasya sudhītvam /
GE07bhg4c01u:218: yuyudhāno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c01u:220: purujit kuntibhojaś ca śaibyaś ca narapuṃgavaḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c01u:221: yudhāmanyuś ca vikrānta uttamaujāś ca vīryavān /
GE07bhg4c01u:222: saubhadro draupadeyāś ca sarva eva mahārathāḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c01u:225: iṣavo bāṇā asyas te kṣipyante ebhir iti iṣāsāḥ dhanūṃṣi /
GE07bhg4c01u:228: tābhyāṃ samāḥ śūrāḥ śauryeṇa kṣātra-dharmeṇopetāḥ santi /
GE07bhg4c01u:229: tān eva nāmabhir nirdiśati yuyudhānaḥ sātyakiḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:232: saubhadro 'bhimanyur draupadeyāḥ draupadyāṃ pañcabhyo yudhiṣṭhirādibhyo jātāḥ putrāḥ prativindhyādayaḥ pañca /
GE07bhg4c01u:234: eko daśa sahasrāṇi yodhayed yas tu dhanvinām /
GE07bhg4c01u:236: amitān yodhayed yas tu samprokto 'tirathas tu saḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:237: caikena yo yudhyet tan-nyūno 'rdha-rathaḥ smṛtaḥ // iti //4-6//
GE07bhg4c01u:239: mahāntaḥ śatrubhiś chettum aśakyā iṣvāsā dhanūṃṣi yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c01u:244: eko daśa sahasrāṇi yodhayed yas tu dhanvinām /
GE07bhg4c01u:246: amitān yodhayed yas tu samprokto 'tirathas tu saḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:247: caikena yo yudhyet tan-nyūno 'rdha-rathaḥ smṛtaḥ // iti //4-6//
GE07bhg4c01u:248: Śrīdhara: nanv ekena dhṛṣṭadyumnenādhiṣṭhitālpikā senāsmadīyenaikenaiva sujeyā syād atas tvaṃ mā trāsīr iti cet tatrāha atreti /
GE07bhg4c01u:249: atra camvāṃ mahāntaḥ śatrubhiś chettum aśakyā iṣvāsāś cāpā yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c01u:257: draupadeyā yudhiṣṭhirādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ kramād draupadyāṃ jātāḥ prativindhya-śrutasena-śrutakīrti-śatānīka-śrutakarmākhyāḥ pañca-putrāḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:265: eko daśa sahasrāṇi yodhayed yas tu dhanvinām /
GE07bhg4c01u:267: amitān yodhayed yas tu samprokto 'tirathas tu saḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:268: caikena yo yudhyet tan-nyūno 'rdha-rathaḥ smṛtaḥ // iti //4-6//
GE07bhg4c01u:270: asmākaṃ tu viśiṣṭā ye tān nibodha dvijottama /
GE07bhg4c01u:271: nāyakā mama sainyasya saṃjñārthaṃ tān bravīmi te //7//
GE07bhg4c01u:278: Baladeva: tarhi kiṃ pāṇḍava-sainyād bhīto 'sīty ācārya-bhāvaṃ sambhāvyāntarjātām api bhītim ācchādayan dhārṣṭyenāha - asmākam iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:279: asmākaṃ sarveṣāṃ madhye ye viśiṣṭāḥ paramotkṛṣṭā budhyādi-bala-śālino nāyakā netāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:282: tadāpi bhīṣmādibhir mad-vijayaḥ setsyaty eveti tat kopotpādanārthaṃ dyotyam //7//
GE07bhg4c01u:284: bhavān bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:286: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:288: Śrīdhara: tān eṣāha bhavān iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c01u:292: anye ceti mad-arthe mat-prayojanārthaṃ jīvitaṃ tyaktum adhyavasitā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:293: nānā anekāni śastrāni praharaṇa-sādhanāni yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c01u:296: tyakta-jīvitā iti jīvita-tyāgenāpi yadi mad-upakāraḥ syāt tadā tad api kartuṃ pravṛttā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:297: vastutas tu mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva nimitta-mātraṃ bhava savyasācin iti bhagavad-ukter duryodhana-sarasvatī satyam evāha sma // 8-9//
GE07bhg4c01u:303: nanv etāvanta eva mat-sainye viśiṣṭāḥ kintv asaṅkhyeyāḥ santīty āha anye ceti /
GE07bhg4c01u:305: tyaktety-ādi karmaṇi niṣṭhā jīvitāni tyaktuṃ kṛta-niścayā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:306: itthaṃ ca teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ mayi snehātirekāt śauryātirekād yuddha-pāṇḍityāc ca mad-vijayaḥ siddhyed eveti dyotyate //8-9//
GE07bhg4c01u:309: paryāptaṃ tv idam eteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam //10//
GE07bhg4c01u:312: tat tathābhūtaiḥ vīrair yuktam api bhīṣmeṇābhirakṣitam api asmākaṃ balaṃ sainyaṃ aparyāptaṃ taiḥ saha yoddhuṃ asamarthaṃ bhāti /
GE07bhg4c01u:313: idam eteṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam sat paryāptaṃ samarthaṃ bhāti /
GE07bhg4c01u:317: pāṇḍavaiḥ saha yoddhuṃ akṣamam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:319: eteṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tu bhīmena sthūla-buddhinā śastra-śāstrānabhijño 'pi rakṣitam paryāptaṃ paripūrṇam /
GE07bhg4c01u:320: asmābhiḥ saha yuddhe pravīṇam ity arthaḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c01u:321: Baladeva: nanv ubhayoḥ sainyayos taulyāt tavaiva vijayaḥ katham ity āśaṅkya sva-sainyādhikyam āha aparyāptam iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:324: eteṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ balaṃ tu paryāptaṃ parimitam /
GE07bhg4c01u:329: bhīṣmam evābhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi //11//
GE07bhg4c01u:330: Viśvanātha: tasmād yuṣmābhiḥ sāvadhānair bhavituvyam ity āha ayaneṣu vyūha-praveśa-mārgeṣu
GE07bhg4c01u:331: yathā-bhāgaṃ vibhaktāḥ svāṃ svāṃ raṇa-bhūmim aparityajyaivāvasthitā bhavanto bhīṣmam
GE07bhg4c01u:332: evābhitas tathā rakṣantu yathānyair yudhyamāno 'yaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kaiścin na hanyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:334: Baladeva: athaivaṃ mad-ukti-bhāvaṃ vijñāyācāryaś ced udāsīta tadā mat-kārya-kṣatir iti vibhāvya tasmin sva-kārya-bhāram arpayann āha ayaneṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:335: ayaneṣu sainya-praveśa-vartmasu yathābhāgaṃ vibhaktāṃ svāṃ svāṃ yuddha-bhūmim aparityajyāvasthitā
GE07bhg4c01u:336: bhavanto bhavad-ādayo bhīṣmame evābhito rakṣantu yuddhābhiniveśāt pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhataś
GE07bhg4c01u:337: cāpaśyantaṃ taṃ yathānyo na vihanyāt tathā kurvantv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:338: senāpatau bhīṣme nirbodhe mad-vijaya-siddhir iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:342: yāvakṣa-sadasi mad-anyāyaṃ vidantāv api draupadyā nyāyaṃ pṛṣṭau nāvocatāṃ mayā tu pāṇḍaveṣu pratītaṃ snehābhāsaṃ tyājayituṃ tathā niveditam iti //11//
GE07bhg4c01u:346: Śrīdhara: tad evaṃ bahu-māna-yuktaṃ rāja-vākyaṃ śrutvā bhīṣmaḥ kiṃ kṛtavān /
GE07bhg4c01u:348: tasya rājño harṣaṃ kurvan pitāmaho bhīṣma uccair mahāntaṃ siṃha-nādaṃ vinadya kṛtvā śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau vāditavān //12//
GE07bhg4c01u:349: Viśvanātha: tataś ca sva-saṃmāna-śravaṇa-janita-harṣas tasya duryodhanasya bhava-vidhvaṃsanena
GE07bhg4c01u:350: harṣaṃ sañanayituṃ kuru-vṛddho bhīṣmaḥ siṃha-nādam iti upamāne karmaṇi ceti ṇamul
GE07bhg4c01u:352: Baladeva: evaṃ duryodhana-kṛtāṃ sva-stutim avadhārya sa-harṣo bhīṣmas tad-antar-jātāṃ bhītim utsādayituṃ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmāv ity āha /
GE07bhg4c01u:353: siṃha-nādam ity upamāne karmaṇi ceti pāṇini-sūtrāt ṇamul /
GE07bhg4c01u:356: mukhataḥ kiñcid anuktvā śaṅkha-nāda-mātra-karaṇena jaya-parājayau khalv īśvarādhīnau tvad-arthe kṣatra-dharmeṇa dehaṃ tyakṣyāmīti vyajyate //12//
GE07bhg4c01u:358: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:360: Śrīdhara: tad evaṃ senāpateḥ bhīṣmasya yuddhotsavam ālokya sarvato yuddhotsavaḥ pravṛtta iy āha tata ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c01u:364: sa ca śaṅkhādi-śabdas tumulo mahān abhūt //13//
GE07bhg4c01u:365: Viśvanātha: tataś cobhayatraiva yuddhotsāhaḥ pravṛtta ity āha tata iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:370: senāpatau bhīṣme pravṛtte tat-sainye sahasā tat-kṣaṇam eva śaṅkhādayo 'bhyahanyanta vāditāḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:373: sa śabdas tumula ekākāratayā mahān āsīt //13//
GE07bhg4c01u:375: tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau /
GE07bhg4c01u:376: mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaś caiva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c01u:377: Śrīdhara: tataḥ pāṇḍava-sainye pravṛttaṃ yuddhotsāham āha tata ity ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:378: tataḥ kaurava-sainya-vādya-kolāhalānantaraṃ mahati syandane rathe sthitau santau śrī-kṛṣṇārjunau divyau śaṅkhau prakarṣeṇa dadhmatur vādayāmāsatuḥ
GE07bhg4c01u:380: Baladeva: atha pāṇḍava-sainye pravṛttaṃ yuddhosavam āha tata iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:381: anyeṣām api ratha-sthitatve saty api kṛṣṇārjunayoḥ ratha-sthitatvoktis tad-rathasyāgni-dattatvaṃ trailokya-vijetṛtvaṃ mahā-prabhavatvaṃ ca vyajyate
GE07bhg4c01u:387: kāśyaś ca parameṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:390: saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak //18//
GE07bhg4c01u:391: Śrīdhara: tad eva vibhāgena darśayann āha pāñcajanyam iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:394: vṛkavat udaraṃ yasya sa vṛkodaro mahā-śaṅkhaṃ pauṇḍraṃ dadhmāv iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:401: paramaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ iṣvāso dhanur yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:407: Baladeva: pāñcajanyam ity ādi pāñcajanyādayaḥ kṛṣṇādi-śaṅkhānām āhvayāḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:410: rājā bhīmakarmā dhanañjaya ity ebhir yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṃ rāja-sūya-yājitva-hiḍimbādi-nihantṛtva-digvijayāhṛtānanta-dhanatvāni ca vyajya pāṇḍava-senā-sūtkarṣaḥ sūcyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:417: pṛthivīpate he dhṛtarāṣṭreti tava durmantraṇodayaḥ kula-kṣaya-lakṣaṇo ' narthaḥ samāsata iti sūcyate //15-18//
GE07bhg4c01u:420: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo vyanunādayan //19//
GE07bhg4c01u:421: Śrīdhara - sa ca śaṅkhānāṃ nādas tvadīyānāṃ mahābhayaṃ janayāmāsety āha sa ghoṣa ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:424: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo 'bhyanunādayan pratidhvanibhir apūryan //19//
GE07bhg4c01u:427: pāṇḍavaiḥ kṛtaḥ śaṅkha-nādo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ bhīṣmādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ hṛṇḍayāṇi vyadārayat /
GE07bhg4c01u:429: tumulo 'titīvraḥ abhyanunādayan pratidhvanibhiḥ p”ryann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:430: dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ kṛtas tu śaṅkhādinādas tumulo 'pi teṣāṃ kiñcid api kṣobhaṃ nājanayat tathānukter iti bodhyam //19//
GE07bhg4c01u:434: Śrīdhara - etasmin samaye śrī-kṛṣṇam arjuno vijñāpayāmāsety āha atha ity ādibhiḥ caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:438: Baladeva - evaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ yuddhe bhītiṃ pradarśya pāṇḍavānāṃ tu tatrotsāham āha atheti sārdhakena /
GE07bhg4c01u:440: dhārtarāṣṭrān bhīṣmādīn kapidhvajo 'rjuno yena śrī-dāśarather api mahānti kāryāni
GE07bhg4c01u:441: purā sādhitāni tena mahāvīreṇa dhvajam adhitiṣñhitā hanumatānugṛhīto bhaya-gandha-śūnya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:443: hṛṣīkeśam iti hṛṣīkeśaṃ sarvendriya-pravartakaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ tad idaṃ vākyam uvāceti /
GE07bhg4c01u:444: sarveśvaro harir yeṣāṃ niyojyas teṣāṃ tad ekānta-bhaktānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ vijaye sandeha-gandho 'pi neti bhāvaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c01u:446: hṛṣīkeśaṃ tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate /
GE07bhg4c01u:447: senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṃ sthāpaya me 'cyuta //21//
GE07bhg4c01u:449: kair mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇasamudyame //22//
GE07bhg4c01u:452: Śrīdhara - tad eva vākyam āha senayor ubhayor ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:454: nanu tvaṃ yoddhā na tu yuddha-prekṣakas tatrāha kair mayety ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:456: yotsyamānān iti dhārtarāṣṭrasya duryodhanasya priyaṃ kartum icchanto ye iha samāgatāḥ tān ahaṃ drakṣyāmi yāvat /
GE07bhg4c01u:457: tāvad ubhayoḥ senayor madhye me rathaṃ sthāpayety anvayaḥ //21-23//
GE07bhg4c01u:460: he acyutedi svabhāva-siddhād bhakta-vātsalyāt pāramaiśvaryāc ca na cyavase smeti
GE07bhg4c01u:461: tena tena ca niyantirto bhaktasya me vākyāt tatra rathaṃ sthitaṃ kuru nirbhaya tatra
GE07bhg4c01u:463: yoddhu-kāmān na tu sahāsmābhiḥ sandhiṃ cikīrṣūn /
GE07bhg4c01u:466: na tu yuddha-prekṣakas tatas tad-darśanena kim iti cet tatrāha kair iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:467: asmin bandhūnām eva mitho raṇodyoge kair bandhubhiḥ saha mama yuddhaṃ bhāvīty etaj-jñānāyaivaa madhye ratha-sthāpanam iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:468: nanu bandhutvād eet sandhim eva vidhātsyantīti cet tatrāha yotsyamānān iti na tu sandhiṃ vidhāsyataḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:470: durbuddheḥ kudhiyaḥ svajīvanopāyānabhijñasya yuddhe na tu durbuddhy-apanayane /
GE07bhg4c01u:476: uvāca pārtha paśyaitān samavetān kurūn iti //25//
GE07bhg4c01u:478: ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam ukta ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:479: uḍākā nidrā tasya īśena jita-nidreṇa arjunena evam uktaḥ san /
GE07bhg4c01u:480: he bhārata, he dhṛtarāṣṭra senayor madhye rathānām uttamaṃ rathaṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ sthāpitavān /
GE07bhg4c01u:481: bhīṣma-droṇa iti mahīkṣitāṃ rājñāṃ ca pramukhataḥ sammukhe rathaṃ sthāpayitvā /
GE07bhg4c01u:482: he pārtha etān kurūn paśyeti śrī-bhagavān uvāca //24-25//
GE07bhg4c01u:484: arjuna-vāg-indriya-mātreṇāpi niyamyo 'bhūd ity aho prea-vaśyatvaṃ bhagavata iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:485: guḍākeśena guḍā yathā mādhurya-mātra-prakāśakās tat tathā svīya-sneha-rasāsvāda-prakāśakā akeśā viṣṇu-brahma-śivā yasya tena akāro viṣṇuḥ ko brahmā īśo mahā-devaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:486: yatra sarvāvatāri-cūḍāmaṇīndraḥ svayaṃ bhagavān śrī-kṛṣṇa eva premādhīnaḥ sann ājñānuvartī babhūva /
GE07bhg4c01u:487: tatra guṇāvatāratvāt tad-aṃśāḥ viṣṇu-brahma-rudrāḥ katham aiśvaryaṃ prakāśayantu /
GE07bhg4c01u:488: kintu svakartṛkaṃ sneha-rasaṃ prakāśyaiva svaṃ svaṃ kṛtārthaṃ manyanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:489: yad uktaṃ śrī-bhagavatā para-vyoma-nāthenāpi dvijātmamajā me yuvayor didṛkṣuṇā iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:490: yad vā, guḍāko nidrā tasyā īśena jita-nidrenety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:491: atrāpi vyākhyāyāṃ sākṣān māyāyā api niyantā yaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ sa cāpi yena premṇā vijitya vaśīkṛtas tenārjunena māyā-vṛttir nidrā varākī jiteti kiṃ citram iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:492: bhīṣma-droṇayoḥ pramukhataḥ pramukhe sammukhe sarveṣāṃ mahīkṣitāṃ rājñāṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c01u:494: Baladeva: tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjayaḥ prāha evam iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:496: tat-parama-bhaktas tenārjunenaivam uktaḥ pravartito hṛṣīkeśas tac-citta-vṛtty-abhijño
GE07bhg4c01u:497: bhagavān senayor madhye bhīṣma-droṇayoḥ sarveṣāṃ ca mahīkṣitāṃ bhū-bhujāṃ ca pramukhataḥ
GE07bhg4c01u:498: sammukhe rathottamaṃ agnidattaṃ rathaṃ sthāpayitvovāca he pārtha samavetān etān kurūn paśyeti /
GE07bhg4c01u:499: pārtha-hṛṣīkeśa-śabdābhyām idaṃ sūcyate matipitṛ-svasṛ-putratvāt tvat-sārathyam ahaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:500: kariṣyāmy eva tvaṃ tv adhunaiva yuyutsāṃ tyakṣyasīti kiṃ śatru-sainya-vīkṣaṇeneti
GE07bhg4c01u:503: tatrāpaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitṝn atha pitāmahān /
GE07bhg4c01u:504: ācāryān mātulān bhrātṝn putrān pautrān sakhīṃs tathā //
GE07bhg4c01u:505: śvaśurān suhṛdaś caiva senayor ubhayor api //26//
GE07bhg4c01u:506: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ pravṛttam ity āha tatrety ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:508: putrān pautrān iti duryodhanādīnāṃ ye putrāḥ pautrāś ca tān ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:511: Viśvanātha: duryodhanādīnāṃ ye putrāḥ pautrāś ca tān /
GE07bhg4c01u:512: Baladeva: evaṃ bhagavatokto 'rjunaḥ para-senām apaśyad ity āha tatreti sārdhakena /
GE07bhg4c01u:524: ubhayor api senayor avasthitān tān sarvān samīkṣyety anvayāt //26//
GE07bhg4c01u:526: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān /
GE07bhg4c01u:528: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ kṛtavān ity āha tān iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:529: senayor ubhayor evaṃ samīkṣya kṛpayā mahatyā āviṣṭaḥ viṣaṇṇaḥ san idam arjuno 'bravīt /
GE07bhg4c01u:533: Baladeva: atha sarveśvaro dayāluḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saparikarātmopadeśena viśvam uddidhīrṣur
GE07bhg4c01u:534: arjunaṃ śiṣyaṃ kartuṃ tat-sva-dharme 'pi yuddhe mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtāni iti śruty-arthābhāsenādharmatām
GE07bhg4c01u:535: ābhāsya taṃ saṃmohaṃ kṛtavān ity āha tān samīkṣyate kaunteya iti svīya-pitṛ-svasṛ-putratvoktyā
GE07bhg4c01u:540: aparayeti vā cchedaḥ sva-sainye pūrvam api kṛpāsti para-sainye tv aparāpi sābhūd ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:545: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati //28//
GE07bhg4c01u:546: vepathuś ca śarīre me romaharṣaś ca jāyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:547: gāṇḍīvaṃ sraṃsate hastāt tvak caiva paridahyate //29//
GE07bhg4c01u:548: Śrīdhara: kim abravīd ity apekṣāyām āha dṛṣṭvemān ity ādi yāvad adhyāya-samāpti /
GE07bhg4c01u:549: he kṛṣṇa yoddhum icchataḥ purataḥ samavasthitān svajanān bandhu-janān dṛṣṭvā madīyāni gātrāṇi karacaraṇādīni sīdanti viśīryante /
GE07bhg4c01u:556: Baladeva: kaunteyaḥ śoka-vyākulaṃ yad āha tad anuvadati dṛṣṭvemam iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:557: svajanaṃ sva-bandhu-vargaṃ jātāv eka-vacanaṃ sa-gotra-bāndhava-jñāti-bandhu-sva-svajanāḥ samāḥ ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:558: dṛṣṭvāsavthitasya mama gātrāṇi kara-caraṇādīni sīdanti śīryante pariśuṣyatīti śramādi-hetukāc choṣād atiśayitvam asya śoṣasya vyajyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:563: na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:565: Śrīdhara: api ca na śaknomīty ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:567: Viśvanātha: viparītāni nimittāni dhana-nimittako 'yam atra me vāsa itivan nimitta-śabdo 'yaṃ prayojana-vācī /
GE07bhg4c01u:568: tataś ca yuddhe vijayino mama rājya-lābhāt sukhaṃ na bhaviṣyati,
GE07bhg4c01u:569: kintu tad-viparītam anutāpa-duḥkham eva bhāvīty arthaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c01u:570: Baladeva: api ceti avasthātuṃ sthiro bhavituṃ mano bhramtīva ceti daurbalya-mūrcchayor udayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:571: nimittāni phalāny atra yuddhe viparītāni paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c01u:572: vijayino me rājya-prāptir ānando na bhaviṣyati kintu tad-viparīto 'nutāpa eva bhāvīti /
GE07bhg4c01u:573: nimitta-śabdaḥ phala-vācī kasmai nimittāyātra vasasi ity ādau tathā pratīteḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c01u:575: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave /
GE07bhg4c01u:576: na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca //31//
GE07bhg4c01u:577: Śrīdhara: kiṃ ca na cety ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:578: āhave yuddhe svajanaṃ hatvā śreyaḥ phalaṃ na paśyāmi /
GE07bhg4c01u:579: vijayādikaṃ phalaṃ kiṃ na paśyasīti cet tatrāha na kāṅkṣa iti //31//
GE07bhg4c01u:580: Viśvanātha: śreyo na paśyāmīti dvāv imau puruṣau loke sūrya-maṇḍala-bhedinau /
GE07bhg4c01u:581: parivrāḍ yoga-yuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukhe hataḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:583: hantus tu na kim ap sukṛtam /
GE07bhg4c01u:584: nana dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ yaśo rājyaṃ vartate yuddhasyety ata āha na kāṅkṣa iti //31//
GE07bhg4c01u:585: Baladeva: evaṃ tattva-jñāna-pratikūlaṃ śokam uktvā tat-pratikūlāṃ viparīta-buddhim āha na ceti /
GE07bhg4c01u:586: āhave svajanaṃ hatvā śreyo naiva paśyāmīti /
GE07bhg4c01u:588: parivrāḍ yoga-yuktaś ca raṇe cābhimukhe hataḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:589: ity ādinā hatasya śreyaḥ-smaraṇāt hantur me na kiñcic chreyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:590: asvajanam iti vā cchedaḥ asvajana-vadhe 'pi śreyaso 'bhāvāt svajana-vadhe punaḥ kutastarāṃ tad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:591: nanu yaśo-rājya-lābho dṛṣṭaṃ phalam astīti cet tatrāha na kāṅkṣa iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:592: rājyādi-spṛhā-virahād upāye vijaye mama pravṛttir na yuktā,
GE07bhg4c01u:596: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā /
GE07bhg4c01u:597: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca //32//
GE07bhg4c01u:598: ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca /
GE07bhg4c01u:599: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c01u:600: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ śyālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā /
GE07bhg4c01u:601: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdana //34//
GE07bhg4c01u:602: api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte /
GE07bhg4c01u:603: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana //35///
GE07bhg4c01u:604: Śrīdhara: etad eva prapañcayati kiṃ no rājyena ity ādi sārdha-dvayena /
GE07bhg4c01u:606: yad-artham asmākaṃ rājyādikam apekṣitam te ete prāṇa-dhanāni tyaktvā tyāgam aṅgīkṛtya yuddhārtham avasthitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:607: ataḥ kim asmākaṃ rājyādibhiḥ kṛtyam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:608: nanu yadi kṛpayā tvam etān na haṃsi tarhi tvām ete rājya-lobhena haniṣyanty eva /
GE07bhg4c01u:609: atas tvam evaitān hatvā rājyaṃ bhuṅkṣveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:613: trailokya-rājyasyāpi hetoḥ tat-prāpty-artham api hantuṃ necchāmi /
GE07bhg4c01u:617: gāḥ sarvendriya-vṛttīḥ vindasīti tvam eva me manogataṃ pratīhīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:619: prāṇān prāṇāśāṃ dhanāni9 dhanāśām iti laksaṇayā bodhyam /
GE07bhg4c01u:620: sva-prāṇa-vyaye 'pi sva-bandhu-sukhārthā rājya-spṛhā syāt teṣām apy atra nāśa-prāpter apārthaiva yuddhe pravṛttir iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:621: nanu tvaṃ cet kāruṇikas etān na hanyās tarhi te sva-rājyaṃ niṣkaṇṭakaṃ kartuṃ tvām eva hanyur iti cet tatrāh etān iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:622: māṃ ghnato 'pi hiṃsato 'py etān hantum ahaṃ necchāmi /
GE07bhg4c01u:624: nanv anvayān hitvā dhṛtarāṣṭra-putrā eva hantavyā,
GE07bhg4c01u:625: bahu-duḥkha-dātṝṇāṃ teṣāṃ ghāte sukha-sambhavād iti cet tatrāha nihatyeti /
GE07bhg4c01u:626: dhārtarāṣṭrān duryodhanādīn nihatya sthitānāṃ naḥ pāṇḍāvānāṃ kā prītiḥ prasannatā syān na kāpīti acira-sukhābhāsa-spṛhayā ciratara-naraka-hetu-bhrāṛho na yogya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:627: he janārdaneti yady ete hantavyās tarhi bhūbhārāpahārī tvam eva tān hahi pareśasya te pāpa-gandha-sambandho na bhaved iti vyajyate //32-35//
GE07bhg4c01u:630: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān svabāndhavān /
GE07bhg4c01u:631: svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava //36//
GE07bhg4c01u:632: Śrīdhara: nanu ca agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:633: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:634: iti smaraṇād agni-dāhādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir hetubhir ete tāvad ātatāyinaḥ ātatāyināṃ ca vadho yukta eva /
GE07bhg4c01u:641: yathoktaṃ yājñavalkyena smṛtyor virodhe nyāyas tu balavān vyavahārataḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:642: artha-śāstrāt tu balavān dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:644: tasmād ātatāyinām apy eteṣām ācāryādīnāṃ vadhe 'smākaṃ pāpam eva bhavet /
GE07bhg4c01u:645: anyāyyatvād adharmatvāc caitad vadhasya amutra ceha vā na sukhaṃ syād ity āha svajanam iti //36//
GE07bhg4c01u:646: Viśvanātha: nanu agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:647: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:651: ity ādi-vacanād eṣāṃ vadha ucita eveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:654: ātatāyinam āyāntam ity ādikam artha-śāstraṃ dharma-śāstrāt durbalam /
GE07bhg4c01u:655: yad uktaṃ yājñavalkyena artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti smṛtam //
GE07bhg4c01u:657: tasmād ācāryādīnāṃ vadhe pāpaṃ syād eva /
GE07bhg4c01u:658: na caihikaṃ sukham api syād ity āha svajanam iti //36//
GE07bhg4c01u:659: Baladeva: nanu agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:660: kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:663: ity ukter eṣāṃ ṣaḍ-vidhyenātatāyināṃ yukto vadha iti cet tatrāha pāpam iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:664: etān hatvā sthitān asmān pāpam eva bandhu-kṣaya-hetukam āśrayet /
GE07bhg4c01u:665: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ ātatāyinam āyāntam ity ādikam artha-śāstraṃ mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtāni iti dharma-śāstrāt durbalam /
GE07bhg4c01u:666: artha-śāstrāt tu balavad dharma-śāstram iti sthitiḥ //
GE07bhg4c01u:668: tasmād durbalārtha-śāstra-balena pūjyānāṃ droṇa-bhīṣmādīnāṃ vadhaḥ pāpa-hetur eveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:669: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmīty ārabhyoktam upasaṃharati tasmād iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:672: na hi gurubhir bandhu-janaiś ca vināsmākaṃ
GE07bhg4c01u:674: he mādhaveti śrīpatis tvam aśrīke yuddhe kathaṃ pravartayasiīti bhāvaḥ //36//
GE07bhg4c01u:676: yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahata-cetasaḥ /
GE07bhg4c01u:678: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum /
GE07bhg4c01u:680: Śrīdhara: nanu tavaiteṣām api bandhu-vadha-doṣe samāne sati yathaivaite bandhu-vadha-doṣam aṅgīkṛtyāpi yuddhe pravartate /
GE07bhg4c01u:681: tathaiva bhavān api pravartatāṃ kim anena viṣādenety ata āha yadyapīti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c01u:682: rājya-lobhenopahataṃ bhraṣṭa-vivekaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te ete duryodhanādayo yadyapi doṣaṃ na paśyanti,
GE07bhg4c01u:683: tathāpi asmābhir doṣaṃ prapaśyadbhir asmāt pāpāt nivartituṃ kathaṃ na jñeyaṃ nivṛttāv eva buddhiḥ kartavyety arthaḥ //37-38//
GE07bhg4c01u:684: Viśvanātha: nanv ete tarhi kathaṃ yuddhe vartante /
GE07bhg4c01u:686: Baladeva: nanu āhūto na nivarteta dyūtād api raṇād api viditaṃ kṣatriyasyeti kṣatra-dharma-smaraṇāt tair āhūtānāṃ bhavatāṃ yuddhe pravṛttir yukteti cet tatrāha yadyapīhi dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c01u:687: pāpe pravṛttau lobhas teṣāṃ hetur asmākaṃ tu lobha-virahān na tatra pravṛttir iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:692: tathā ca śyenenābhicaran yajeta ity ādi śāstrokte 'pi śyenādāv ivāniṣṭānubandhitvād yuddhe 'smin naḥ pravṛttir na yukteti /
GE07bhg4c01u:693: āhūta ity ādi śāstraṃ tu kula-kṣaya-doṣaṃ vinā bhūta-viṣayaṃ bhāvi /
GE07bhg4c01u:697: dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta //39//
GE07bhg4c01u:698: Śrīdhara: tam eva doṣaṃ darśayati kula-kṣaya ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:700: uta api avaśiṣṭaṃ kṛtsnam api kulam adharmo 'bhibhavati vyāpnotīty arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c01u:701: Viśvanātha: kula-kṣaya iti sanātanāḥ kula-parasparā-prāptatvena bahu-kālataḥ prāptā ity arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c01u:702: Baladeva: doṣam eva prapañcayati kula-kṣaya iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:703: kula-dharmāḥ kulocitā agni-hotrādayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ kula-paraspara-prāptāḥ praṇaśyanti kartur vināśāt /
GE07bhg4c01u:704: utety apy arthe kṛtsnam ity anena sambadhyate /
GE07bhg4c01u:705: dharme naṣṭe saty avaśiṣṭaṃ bālādi-kṛtsnam api kulam adharmo 'bhibhavati satīty arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c01u:709: Śrīdhara: tataś ca adharmābhibhavād ity ādi //40//
GE07bhg4c01u:711: adharma eva tā vyabhicāre pravartayatīti bhāvaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c01u:713: asmad-bhartṛbhir dharmam ullaṅghya yathā̆akula-kṣaya-lakṣaṇe pāpe vartitaṃ,
GE07bhg4c01u:714: tathāsmābhiḥ pātivratyam avajñāya durācāre vartitavyam iti durbuddhi-hatāḥ kula-striyaḥ praduṣyeyur ity arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c01u:718: Śrīdhara: evaṃ sati saṅkara ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:720: hi yasmāt luptāḥ piṇḍodaka-kriyā yeṣāṃ te tathā /
GE07bhg4c01u:722: Baladeva: kulasya saṅkaraḥ kula-ghnānāṃ narakāyaiveti yojanā /
GE07bhg4c01u:723: na kevalaṃ kula-ghnā eva narake patanti,
GE07bhg4c01u:724: kintu tat-pitaro 'pīty āha patantīti hir hetau /
GE07bhg4c01u:725: paṇḍādi dātṝṇāṃ putrādīnām abhāvād vilupta-piṇḍādi-kriyā santas te narakāyaiva patanti //41//
GE07bhg4c01u:729: Śrīdhara: ukta-doṣam upasaṃharati doṣair iti dvābhyāṃ /
GE07bhg4c01u:731: jāti-dharmā varṇa-dharmāḥ kula-dharmāś ceti ca-kārād āśrama-dharmādayo 'pi gṛhyante //42//
GE07bhg4c01u:734: Baladeva: ukta-doṣam upasaṃharati doṣair iti dvābhyāṃ /
GE07bhg4c01u:743: utsannāḥ kula-dharmā yeṣām iti utsanna-jāti-dharmānām apy upalakṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c01u:756: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam /
GE07bhg4c01u:758: Śrīdhara: bandhu-vadhādhyavasāyena santy upamāne āha aho batetyādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:759: svajanaṃ hantum udyatā iti yat etan-mahat-pāpaṃ kartum adhyavasāyaṃ kṛtavanto vayam /
GE07bhg4c01u:760: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam ity arthaḥ //44//
GE07bhg4c01u:762: Baladeva: bandhu-vadhādhyavasāyenāpi pāpaṃ sambhāvyānupapannāha aho iti /
GE07bhg4c01u:766: dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet //45//
GE07bhg4c01u:767: Śrīdhara: evaṃ santaptaḥ san mṛtyum evāśaṃsamāna āha yadi mām ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:768: apratīkāraṃ tuṣṇīm upaviṣṭaṃ māṃ yadi haniṣyanti tarhi tad-dhananaṃ mama kṣemataram atyantaṃ hitaṃ bhavet pāpāniṣpatteḥ //45//
GE07bhg4c01u:770: Baladeva: nanu tvayi bandhu-vadhād vinivṛtte 'pi bhīṣmādibhir yuddhotsukais tva-vadhaḥ syād eva tataḥ kiṃ vidheyam iti cet tatrāha yadi mām ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:773: bhīṣmādayas tu na tat-pāpa-phalaṃ prāpsyanty eveti bhāvaḥ //45//
GE07bhg4c01u:777: Śrīdhara: tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam uktvety ādi /
GE07bhg4c01u:778: saṅkhye saṅgrāme rathopasthe rathasyopari upāviśat upaviveśa /
GE07bhg4c01u:779: śokena saṃvignaṃ prakampitaṃ mānasaṃ cittaṃ yasya saḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c01u:786: Baladeva: tataḥ kim abhūd ity apekṣāyāṃ sañjaya uvāca evam utveti /
GE07bhg4c01u:787: saṅkhye yuddhe rathopasthe rathopari upāviśat upaviveśa /
